tool_description: Api for Paperlit digital publishing platform
name: Paperlit
title: Paperlit

api_list.name: Add Variant
api_list.description: Add a new variant for a specific issue

api_list.name: Login
api_list.description: Request the user's token to access to APIs
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://paperlit.p.rapidapi.com/v8/users/token/get"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "paperlit.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
